definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Today, cloudy, overcast days, a little bit.
There is much greenery in lands of fog and clouds and shadow.
sentences.chinese: 多雲多霧和多蔭的地帶，草木也蔥鬱茂盛。

sentences.english: Today, by high-pressure control, our country in most areas for the sunny to cloudy weather.
sentences.chinese: 今日，受高壓控制，我國大部地區爲晴到多雲天氣。

sentences.english: Haze Shenron - Haze Shenron is the Dragon of Pollution.
sentences.chinese: 第二天是個陰霾多雲的日子。

sentences.english: The day will be cloudy with a slight chance of some rain later tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天多雲，後半夜有少許可能有雨。

sentences.english: Which cloudy morning was followed by a sunny afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 上午多雲，下午放晴，這種日子有嗎？

sentences.english: The weather became windy and cloudy.
And the story with applying the fluoride by drinking it in water is even cloudier .
sentences.chinese: 和故事與應用氟飲水，它在水中，甚至多雲。

sentences.english: The month was also cloudier than normal.
It was cloudy outside, but she chanced it without her raincoat.
sentences.chinese: 外面天多雲，但是她想不帶雨衣碰碰運氣。

sentences.english: B: Sunny and mild today, cloudy and rainy tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天晴朗溫和，明天多雲有雨。

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, the weather is cool and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 當氣候多雲的氣候風涼恬靜。

sentences.english: And vice versa—when there's less sunlight on a cloudy day, it's usually windy.
sentences.chinese: 相反地，當天氣多雲陽光也不足的時候，通常就有風。

sentences.english: Most of the parts in northern China, however, will remain sunny or cloudy, with the temperature rising steadily.
sentences.chinese: 北方大部地區天氣則以晴到多雲爲主，氣溫逐漸回升。

sentences.english: Linfen would be windy and its temperature would be twenty-three to thirty-two.
sentences.chinese: 太原將多雲時溫度從十八歲到二十八歲。

sentences.english: If it's cloudy, you don't even see the sun.
sentences.chinese: 要是多雲，連太陽都看不到。

definition: (idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
